title: df: types: Audit Input.get_parents/inputs/Parameter.inputs

labels.name: Alice
labels.description: Work related to our tutorial series "Rolling Alice"

body:
`get_parents` was meant as a way to get the ancestry of a piece of data in the InputNetwork. This functionality may need to be removed.

https://github.com/intel/dffml/blob/2c671985d3aef0886554397c729aa2b667884be1/dffml/df/types.py#L115-L117
